description: This environmental quiz game aims to raise awareness of climate issues. One to four players test their knowledge of environmental and climate facts in several themed stages. In between sets of questions, players travel through simple board game-style levels which affect the upcoming trivia. The questions are extremely difficult and assume a strong familiarity with climate science, so players are encouraged to replay the game many times in order to learn the answers.
title: Quiz Econosaurus

description:
In the far future, humanity has been exploring the depths of outer space. When testing a new powerful form of warp technology, humanity accidentally encounters unidentified alien forces who immediately attack; a single troop of elite Valkyrie space fighters is the only hope to counter them.

Space Berserker is a very typical FMV-based rail shooter. The player controls their spaceship from a first-person perspective with scenery and enemy ships presented via laserdisc full motion video. The game features large amounts of voice acting, with detailed story scenes in between missions and extensive dialogue during missions.
title: Space Berserker

description:
In the distant future year of 2094, only a few humans are left alive after a deadly attack by aliens known as the Fesendenz. The few survivors have banded together to launch a counterattack.

The player controls a Hyperion space ship. The game is played from a top-down perspective; the player's ship and enemies are 2D sprites, while scenery and bosses are 3D animated FMV footage displayed using laserdisc video. Gameplay is fast and frantic, and the player must contend with both enemies and scenery.
title: Hyperion

description: 3D Museum is an interactive multimedia experience. Side 1, 3D Library, provides a tour of CG animation which serves as a demonstration of the LaserActive's 3D imaging support. Animations can be viewed using the LaserActive's 3D shutter glasses, red-blue glasses, or the naked eye. Side 2, Music Odyssey, presents ambient and contemporary classical music set to nature footage. It also features a "Custom Tour" program editor which allows players to create their own tours with their choice of imagery and music.
title: 3D Museum

description: 3D Virtual Australia is an edutainment game presenting the sights of Australia. It gives players a tour through its geography, culture, and nature.
title: 3D Virtual Australia

description: This occult-themed fortune-telling game features a live-action demon who tells the player's fortune based on their answers to a series of questions.
title: Akuma no Shinban: Konseiki Saigo no Shinri Game

description: In this adult poker game, players play against one of three adult models. Winning rounds rewards the player with suggestive photos and videos.
title: Angel Mate

description: This educational quiz game challenges players' knowledge of Edo-period Japan. Multiple-choice questions are presented in-character by a live action presenter, and questions are also framed with photos and other material to provide historical context.
title: Back to the Edo

description:
Don Quixote wakes from a nightmare about the destruction of the kingdom of Trapobana. Deciding to pursue the dream, he leaves to rescue the Princess Dulcinea and return the seven crystal balls that govern the kindgom.

This RPG is a first-person dungeon crawler with exploration and combat in the traditional Wizardry style. It makes extensive use of the LaserActive's hardware, with all conversations and even in-battle combat animations using laserdisc FMV with traditional animation.
title: Don Quixote: A Dream in Seven Crystals

description: This strip mahjong game features one-on-one mahjong matches with a Japanese model. Winning matches rewards the player with nude images and videos.
title: Dora Dora Paradise

description: In this photography game, players control the videographer Dr. Paolo and shoot footage of six models.
title: Dr. Paolo no Totteoki Video

description: The player, tasked with exploring a haunted mansion at the edge of town, must hunt down and trap as many ghosts as they can. Each floor of the mansion is randomly generated each playthrough. In between floors, the player has the opportunity to buy new items and check their rank. Graphics are presented using laserdisc FMV, using a mixture of clay animation and CGI.
title: Ghost Rush!

description: Goku, the hero from Journey to the West, guides the player through the seven wonders of the ancient world. 3D CGI videos recreate the ancient wonders to help bring them to life; narration from Goku and other figures provide historical information.
title: Goku

description: This interactive edutainment disc teaches about the Great Pyramid of Giza through a mixture of live-action video and computer graphics.
title: The Great Pyramid

description: The player takes control of a member of the special Hi-Roller helicopter squadron which has been dispatched to take out a secret nuclear launch facility. Gameplay takes place from a first-person cockpit view; as the helicopter flies through fixed FMV routes, the player controls a crosshair to shoot down enemy ships. There are six missions total, with the player able to choose their order.
title: Hi-Roller Battle

description: When an ozone sample is stolen right before a pivotal climate conference, Sherlock must track it down. The majority of the game is comprised of non-interactive live-action cutscenes; these are interspersed with first-person driving sections where Sherlock navigates London, and sections where the player scans for clues in live-action footage of London.
title: I Will: The Story of London

description:
This edutainment encyclopedia contains a variety of information about dolphins and other cetaceans. All of the content is presented in a multimedia format, combining still images, high-quality animations and video, and voiceovers. Side A, "Who are the dolphins?", pairs informational content with minigames and quizzes. Players can either choose to browse the disc at their leisure, or they can take a guided tour that walks through the disc's contents in a set order. The tour opens with an introduction to the experts who consulted in the creation of the game, then walks players through dolphin physiology, communication, and social structures. Before continuing the tour, players are then led into an intermission that allows players to play the minigame Hi Dolphin!; watch a video of dolphins in action; and browse a photo gallery. Hi Dolphin! is a simple timing game in which tap a button in time with on-screen prompts, and are rewarded with cute and funny dolphin animations. The tour then continues with sections on dolphin encounters, healing, and human/dolphin coexistence.

Side B, "Dolphin Odyssey", contains an interactive documentary pairing video and stills. It also contains a virtual fish tank feature.
title: Melon Brains

description: This interactive adult disc features nude photos of model Minayo Watanabe.
title: Bi Illusion Collection: Minayo Watanabe

alternate_titles.title: Pretty Illusion Collection Vol. 2 - Yuko Sakaki

description: This interactive adult disc features nude photos of model Yuko Sakaki.
title: Bi Illusion Collection Vol. 2: Yuko Sakaki

description: This first-person rail shooter puts the player in the cockpit of a giant robot. Similar to Battle Clash, each of the five stages finds the player chasing down a single enemy. Players must shoot down the enemy's attacks while also trying to deal as much damage to the enemy mech as possible. Levels play out on prerendered CG FMV backgrounds, while player and enemy characters are all presented as sprites.
title: Vajra

description: Like the previous game, Vajra 2 puts the player in the cockpit of a giant mecha chasing after other mecha. This game changes the formula by interspersing chase levels with more traditional rail shooter levels in which players take on large numbers of smaller enemies. Stage backgrounds and large enemies are presented using prerendered CG FMV, while enemies and player bullets use traditional game graphics.
title: Vajra 2

description: This adult game puts the player in the role of a photographer in shoots with models Naomi Sawada and Shinobu Miyazaki. Players choose a model and shoot locations, then capture photos during live-action FMV video cutscenes. In between shoots, players can talk to models.
title: Virtual Cameraman

description: This adult game puts the player in the role of a photographer in shoots with models Ari Ando, Yumika Sugimoto, and Shiori Fujitani. Players choose a model and shoot locations, then capture photos during live-action FMV video cutscenes. In between shoots, players can talk to models. This game supports the LaserActive's 3D goggles.
title: Virtual Cameraman 2

description:
Zapping Satsui is LD-ROM² version of a detective/crime thriller story originally broadcasted in German television. The idea was to show the same story from the perspectives of two characters, Christine and Stefan. The movie was aired simultaneously on two different channels and viewers could decide how the story may go by switching from one channel to another. The same approach was used on LD-ROM².

If it is about the story, Stefan is an artist who travels to a different city in search of work. He finds out that he was tricked into transporting a bag of drugs for Christine. After that he decides to stay in the city to which he arrived. Christine's boss - Octave, decides to frame Stefan for other crimes...
title: Zapping Satsui
